content:
@Simon Henry posted this on the category theory mailing list:

Dear category theorist,
The University of Ottawa is advertising a Tenure-Track position in pure
maths:

https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs/list/25879

Category theory, as well as topology, is explicitly listed as an area of
interest for the position (among several other topics). It is intended
to be at an Assistant or Associate professor level.

The deadline for application is January 15.

This is a Tier 2 Canada Research Chair, meaning that it comes with a
reduced teaching load and additional research found for 5 years,
renewable once. But to clarify, this is not a 5-year position: it just
becomes an ordinary tenured Prof position after that 5/10 years period.

Best regards,

Simon Henry
